quotes: TheNextGig live project was an extremely smooth, enjoyable and brilliant learning experience for us. The project we worked on helped us gain knowledge of the industry and gave us a chance to apply our learnings in a practical manner. Had immense support from Urmil and Dhairya throughout the project.
name: Kirti Agrawal

quotes: I am super grateful to the TNG Team for the opportunity they provided us with. If not for them, we would have definitely been at homes fooling around doing nothing but now we are getting hands on experience from the best people in the business.
name: Saurabh Zanwar

quotes: It was an amazing experience all the way from the submitting the project, interviewing students, and then the 45 days of getting the project done! They went beyond expectations in coordination, communication and troubleshooting.
name: Studysid

quotes: We have used their services for a couple of projects now and both the times we received credible candidate profiles and their project management skills ensured the quality and timely completion of the tasks given.
name: Pirimid
